trans-unit.source: Provides a regular expression to parse an ASP.NET comment block.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于分析 ASP.NET 注释块的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The CommentRegex class provides a compiled regular expression to parse an ASP.NET comment block (`<%--` …
trans-unit.target: CommentRegex 类提供已编译的正则表达式分析 ASP.NET 注释块 (`<%--` ...

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions> classes are used internally by the .NET Framework to parse ASP.NET pages.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions>类用于内部由.NET Framework 分析 ASP.NET 页。</xref:System.Web.RegularExpressions>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.CommentRegex"></xref> class.
This constructor instantiates a compiled regular expression whose predefined regular expression pattern is `\G<%--(([^-]*)-)*?-%>`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数实例化其预定义的正则表达式模式已编译的正则表达式`\G<%--(([^-]*)-)*?-%>`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.CommentRegex"></xref> class with the specified time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.RegularExpressions.CommentRegex"></xref>类指定的超时值。

trans-unit.source: The `A_1` parameter represents the maximum time interval during which the regular expression engine tries to find a match before the operation times out and a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: `A_1`参数表示正则表达式引擎尝试查找匹配项，操作超时并在此期间的最大时间间隔<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>引发异常。</xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexMatchTimeoutException>

trans-unit.source: A time-out interval, or <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=fullName> if matching operations should not time out.
trans-unit.target: 超时间隔，或<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.InfiniteMatchTimeout?displayProperty=fullName>如果匹配操作不应超时。
